title: Wrong Item Delivered
complaint_description: Customer received a different item than ordered. Expected Cordless Vacuum, but received Noise-Cancelling Headphones.
resolution_steps: Acknowledge message and apologize for inconvenience.
Request any required proof (photos, order number).
Offer full refund if customer prefers; follow up when return tracking shows item received.
Confirm with customer when resolution completed and close the ticket.
agent_notes: Assigned to support agent #8454. Follow-up in 24-48 hours.
